member.summary: Page Load Event - Initializes the page and loads student data

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.btnCreate_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: ADD STUDENT OPERATION Handles creating new students with full validation and error recovery

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.btnUpdate_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: UPDATE STUDENT OPERATION Updates existing student with verification for connection issues

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.btnDelete_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: DELETE STUDENT OPERATION Removes student with enrollment checks and no form validation

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.btnClear_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: CLEAR FORM OPERATION Resets all form fields and states

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.gvStudents_SelectedIndexChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: GRIDVIEW ROW SELECTION EVENT Populates form fields when a student is selected from the grid

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.LoadStudents
member.summary: LOAD STUDENTS DATA Retrieves all students from database with retry logic for connection issues

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.GetConnection
member.summary: GET DATABASE CONNECTION Returns a tested, working connection with pool management

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.VerifyStudentUpdate(System.Int64,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: VERIFY STUDENT UPDATE Checks if an update operation actually succeeded by comparing database values Used when connection drops during update operations
member.returns: True if database matches expected values

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.EmailExists(System.String)
member.summary: CHECK EMAIL EXISTS Verifies if an email address is already in use
member.returns: True if email exists in database

member.name: M:StudentInformationSystem.ManageStudents.StudentExists(System.Int64)
member.summary: CHECK STUDENT EXISTS Verifies if a student ID exists in the database
